_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description:
Select your victory condition. You can choose any of the following:
- Beating the Pal Boss Fight (Friday Morning)
- Beating the Normal Mode Max Mode, Percy's Best Friend
- Beating the Pal Boss Fight Max Mode, Parasitic Pals

description: This is a Toggle
A simple boolean, aka True or False set the initial value with "default"
This is a Choice
Let the user pick from a list of values
allow_custom_value let a player define their own text value
Currently the only use for Choice in Manual outside of hooks is the goal
This is a Range
Allow the player to specify a value between 'start' and 'end'
if you include a "values" you can define the label for certain values
Currently the only use for Range in Manual outside of hooks is 'filler_trap'
Add Checks for getting jumpscared by each Character in the game.
(14 Checks)
Allow obtaining Ranks as Checks. Select the highest Rank that you want to be Checks.
If you obtain a Rank higher than one for a Check, you can still send it.
For example, getting an A Rank would allow you to send Checks for Ranks F, D, C, B, and A,
but not S, assuming every Rank is enabled.
(30 Checks, 5 Checks per Tier)
Enable Checks for each of the Challenges found in Custom Hour.
Recommended to disable if you have Friday Morning as your Goal.
(6 Checks)
